title: Quarkus version of jbang does not support M1, but mainline jbang now does

labels.name: area/jbang
labels.description: Issues related to when using jbang.dev with Quarkus

body:
### Describe the bug

I'm seeing some test failures related to M1 support. Looking into them a bit, they're originating in the `jbang` script. The good news is that jbang has added some fixes for M1 which we can pull across. 

I can see that https://github.com/jbangdev/jbang/issues/650 added partial support, to avoid failing in cases where an M1 JVM was present on the system. https://github.com/jbangdev/jbang/pull/1269 is more recent and will do a download, but force java17 (since that's all Temurium has).  



### Expected behavior

`quarkus build` on M1 (without a native build) should build cleanly. 

### Actual behavior

The build fails on M1: 

```
[INFO] Results:
[INFO] 
[ERROR] Failures: 
[ERROR]   CliProjectJBangTest.testCreateAppDefaults:64 Expected OK return code. Result:
result: {
  exitCode: {1},
  system_err: {Unsupported Architecture: arm64
},
  system_out: {}
} ==> expected: <0> but was: <1>
[ERROR]   CliProjectJBangTest.testCreateAppOverrides:98 Expected OK return code. Result:
result: {
  exitCode: {1},
  system_err: {Unsupported Architecture: arm64
},
  system_out: {}
} ==> expected: <0> but was: <1>
[ERROR]   CliProjectJBangTest.testCreateCliDefaults:127 Expected OK return code. Result:
result: {
  exitCode: {1},
  system_err: {Unsupported Architecture: arm64
},
  system_out: {[DEBUG] Build project with initial parameters: Build [buildOptions=BuildOptions [buildNative=false, clean=true, offline=false, skipTests=false], properties={property=value1, property2=value2, maven.repo.local=/Users/holly/.m2/repository, maven.settings=/Users/holly/.m2/settings.xml}, output=OutputOptions [testMode=true, showErrors=true, verbose=true], params=[]]
/Users/holly/Code/quarkus/myfork/quarkus/devtools/cli/target/test-project/CliProjectJBangTest/code-with-quarkus/jbang --verbose --fresh build -Dproperty=value1 -Dproperty2=value2 -Dmaven.repo.local=/Users/holly/.m2/repository -Dmaven.settings=/Users/holly/.m2/settings.xml -DquarkusRegistryClient=true src/main.java

}
} ==> expected: <0> but was: <1>
[INFO] 
[ERROR] Tests run: 78, Failures: 3, Errors: 0, Skipped: 0
[INFO] 
[WARNING] Corrupted STDOUT by directly writing to native stream in forked JVM 1. See FAQ web page and the dump file /Users/holly/Code/quarkus/myfork/quarkus/devtools/cli/target/surefire-reports/2022-04-26T18-03-47_990-jvmRun1.dumpstream
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] BUILD FAILURE
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Total time:  01:19 min
[INFO] Finished at: 2022-04-26T18:05:03+01:00
```

Running the jbang build directly also fails:

```Unsupported Architecture: arm64```

### How to Reproduce?

This can be seen by running a build with tests on an M1 system: 

1. ```./mvnw -Dquickly -DskipTests=false -f devtools/cli ```

Alternatively, the jbang build command can be run directly, and will fail: 

```
holly@hcummins-mac quarkus % quarkus build -e -B --clean -Dproperty=value1 -Dproperty2=value2 -Dmaven.repo.local=/Users/holly/.m2/repository --cli-test --cli-test-dir /Users/holly/Code/quarkus/myfork/quarkus/devtools/cli/target/test-project/CliProjectJBangTest/cli-nested/my-project
Unsupported Architecture: arm64
```

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Darwin hcummins-mac 21.4.0 Darwin Kernel Version 21.4.0: Fri Mar 18 00:46:32 PDT 2022; root:xnu-8020.101.4~15/RELEASE_ARM64_T6000 arm64

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "17.0.2" 2022-01-18 OpenJDK Runtime Environment Temurin-17.0.2+8 (build 17.0.2+8) OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM Temurin-17.0.2+8 (build 17.0.2+8, mixed mode)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

HEAD

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Maven home: /Users/holly/.m2/wrapper/dists/apache-maven-3.8.4-bin/52ccbt68d252mdldqsfsn03jlf/apache-maven-3.8.4 Java version: 17.0.2, vendor: Eclipse Adoptium, runtime: /Library/Java/JavaVirtualMachines/temurin-17.jdk/Contents/Home Default locale: en_GB, platform encoding: UTF-8 OS name: "mac os x", version: "12.3.1", arch: "aarch64", family: "mac"

### Additional information

_No response_
